title: Are Clorox Wipes and Toilet Paper Sold Out Again?
subtitle: Fears of empty store shelves returned in mid-November 2020 as COVID-19 case numbers reached new heights.
author: Jordan Liles
vclaim: In mid-November 2020, paper products, disinfecting wipes, and cleaning supplies sold out in U.S. stores, with inventory reduced to the same levels seen in March 2020.
